name: Event_MilitaryDictatorshipsintheBalkans
text: Recruit an Italian Army in the Balkans: then eliminate an Allied Army in Ukraine.

name: Status_DiveBombers
text: Use once per turn when you battle a land space. Discard the top 1 card of your draw deck to battle in the same or adjacent land space to the one battled.

name: Status_WolfPacks
text: German EW cards containing the word "Submarines" discard 2 extra Allied cards (in total); 3 if a German Army occupies Scandinavia.

name: Status_Blitzkrieg
text: Use once per turn when you battle a land space. Discard the top 1 card of your draw deck to build an Army in the space battled.

name: Status_BiasforAction
text: Use once per turn when you build an Army. Discard the top 1 card of your draw deck to battle a land space adjacent to the Army just built.

name: Status_SuperiorPlanning
text: Use once per turn at the beginning of your turn. Examine the top 4 cards of your draw deck and put them back in the order of your choice.

name: Status_AbundantResources
text: During your Victory step, gain +1 Victory Point for each German Army in Ukraine, Kazakhstan, or Russia.

name: Status_SyntheticFuel
text: Use once per turn when you build an Army. Discard the top 2 cards of your draw deck to build an Army adjacent to the Army just built.

name: EW_SubmarinesRaidMurmanskConvoy
text: For each German Army or Navy in or adjacent to Scandinavia: gain +1 Victory Point and the Soviet Union must discard the top 2 cards of its draw deck.

name: Status_AtlanticWall
text: Use once per turn when an Axis Army is battled in Western Europe. The country initiating the battle must discard the top 3 cards of its draw deck.

name: Status_Volksturm
text: Use once per turn, at the beginning of your turn. Discard the top 1 card of your draw deck to recruit an Army in Germany. (This is in addition to your Play step.)

name: EW_SubmarinesoftheMonsoonGroup
text: The Allied country of your choice must discard the top 2 cards of its draw deck. Gain +2 Victory Points.

name: Event_BroadFront
text: Conduct up to 3 battles, each in a space that was occupied by a Soviet Army adjacent to a German Army at the beginning of the turn.

name: Event_GunsandButter
text: This card can be used to: build an Army; build a Navy; land battle; or sea battle.

name: EW_SubmarinesEnforceBlockade
text: For each German Army adjacent to the North Sea, gain +1 Victory Point and the United Kingdom must discard the top 2 cards of its draw deck.

name: Status_SwedishIronOre
text: During your Victory step, gain +1 Victory Point if a German Navy is in the Baltic Sea; then gain +1 Victory Point if a German Army is in Scandinavia.

name: EW_SubmarinesLeadtheBattleoftheAtlantic
clabel: Submarines Lead the Battle of the Atlantic [WIP]
text: For each German Navy on the board, gain +1 Victory Point and the United Kingdom must discard the top 2 cards of its draw deck.

name: EW_VWeapons
text: If a German Army is in Western Europe, gain +3 Victory Points and the United Kingdom must discard the top 1 card of its draw deck.

name: Status_Conscription
text: During your Play step, instead of playing a card from hand, discard the top 2 cards of your draw deck to build an Army.

name: Event_Plunder
text: Gain +1 Victory Point for each German Army or Navy outside Germany.

name: Event_ForcedConscription
text: Recruit 1 or 2 Armies in or adjacent to Germany.

name: Status_JetFighters
text: When you are the target of an EW card, reduce the number of cards you must discard by 3 (minimum 0).

name: EW_SubmarinesPreyonUnprotectedShipping
text: The United Kingdom must discard the top 2 cards of its draw deck; and 3 more if there is no Allied Navy in the North Sea. Gain +1 Victory Point.

name: Event_TheAutobahn
text: One at a time, once per Army, you may eliminate each German Army on the board and then build that Army.

name: Status_MackenzieKingDraftstheNationalResourcesMobilizationAct
clabel: Mackenzie King Drafts the National Resources Mobilization Act [WIP]
text: During your Victory step, gain +1 Victory Point if a United Kingdom Navy is in the North Atlantic; then gain +1 Victory Point if a United Kingdom Army is in Canada.

name: Status_AustraliaFormstheDirectorateofManpower
clabel: Australia Forms the Directorate of Manpower [WIP]
text: Whenever you may build an Army, you may instead recruit that Army in Australia.

name: Status_LordLinlithgowDeclaresIndiatoBeatWar
clabel: Lord Linlithgow Declares India to Be at War [WIP]
text: Whenever you may build an Army, you may instead recruit that Army in India.

name: EW_BomberCommand
text: Your choice of Germany or Italy must discard the top 4 cards of its draw deck.

name: Event_SingaporeFortified
text: Recruit an Army in Southeast Asia and then a Navy in the South China Sea.

name: EW_MaltaSubmarines
text: Germany and Italy each must choose to either discard the top 2 cards of its draw deck or eliminate a Navy in the Mediterranean.

name: Event_KingPeterEnthronedinYugoslavia
text: Eliminate an Axis Army in the Balkans; then recruit an Army in the Balkans.

name: Status_Resistance
text: During your Play step, instead of playing a card from hand, discard 2 cards from your hand to battle in Western Europe or Italy.

name: Response_ASWTactics
text: Use immediately after an Axis player plays an EW card. Ignore the game text of that EW card.

name: Response_DefensivePosture
text: Use when your supplied Army is about to be removed. Do not remove that Army this turn.

name: Response_Destroyers
text: Use when a supplied United States or United Kingdom Navy is about to be removed. Do not remove that Navy this turn.

name: Event_IncreasedCommonwealthSupport
text: Recruit a United Kingdom Army in India, Australia, or Canada.

name: Response_EnigmaCodeCracked
text: Use immediately after Germany uses a Status card's game text. Discard the Status card just after is has been used.

name: Status_TheRoyalNavy
text: Use once per turn when you battle a sea space. Discard 2 cards from your hand to battle the same or a different sea space.

name: Response_LoyaltotheCrown
text: Use immediately after an Axis Army is built in India, Australia, or Canada. Eliminate the Army just built.

name: Response_Rationing
text: Use during your Play step after playing a card. Instead of placing that card in your discard pile, shuffle it into your draw deck.

name: Event_GeneralSmutsStrengthensTiestoUK
clabel: General Smuts Strengthens Ties to UK [WIP]
text: Recruit an Army in Africa and a Navy in the Southern Ocean or the Bay of Bengal.

name: Response_RAF
text: Use when your piece in or adjacent to the United Kingdom is about to be removed. Do not remove that piece this turn.

name: EW_SubmarinesSupportPacificIslands
text: For each Japanese Navy in or adjacent to the East Pacific, gain +2 Victory Points and the United States must discard the top 2 cards of its draw deck.

name: Response_ChinaOffensive
text: Use when you battle in China or an adjacent land space. Build an Army in the space battled: then battle in China or an adjacent land space.

name: Response_DestroyerTransport
text: Use when you battle a sea space. Build 1 or 2 Armies adjacent to the space just battled.

name: EW_IndianOceanPatrols
text: For each Japanese Navy in or adjacent to the Bay of Bengal, gain +2 Victory Points and the United Kingdom must discard the top 2 cards of its draw deck.

name: Response_Truk
text: Use anytime during your turn. All Japanese pieces in or adjacent to the Central Pacific are in supply for the rest of this turn.

name: EW_ImperialDesigns
text: During your Victory step, gain +1 Victory Point if a Japanese Army is in Iwo Jima or the Philippines. (Only +1 Victory Point can be earned.)

name: Response_KwantungArmy
text: Use when a supplied Japanese Army is about to be removed from China, Szechuan, Mongolia, or Vladivostok. Do not remove that Army this turn.

name: Status_UnimpededMerchantShipping
text: During your Victory step, gain +1 Victory Point if the Allies do not have an Army in Hawaii.

name: Response_BanzaiCharge
text: Use when you battle a land space. Battle in the same or an adjacent land space to the one just battled.

name: Status_ForwardBases
text: During your Victory step, gain +2 Victory Points if a Japanese Army is in Hawaii, Pacific Northwest, or New Zealand. (Only +2 Victory Point can be earned.)

name: Response_Kamikaze
text: Use immediately after an Allied Navy is built adjacent to a Japanese piece. Eliminate the Navy just built.

name: Status_GreaterEastAsiaCoProsperitySphere
clabel: Greater East Asia Co Prosperity Sphere [WIP]
text: During your Victory step, gain +1 Victory Point for each Japanese Army in Indonesia, New Guinea, or Southeast Asia.

name: Response_FallofSingapore
text: Use when you battle in Southeast Asia. Battle the South China Sea; then recruit an Army in Southeast Asia.

name: Response_SurpriseAttack
text: Use when you battle a sea space. Battle a sea space; then battle a land space.

name: Response_MobileForce
text: Use at the beginning of your turn. Recruit a Navy in or adjacent to the North Pacific.

name: Response_BattleshipRepair
text: Use when your supplied Navy is about to be removed. Do not remove that Navy this turn.

name: Response_SpecialNavalLandingForces
text: Use when you build a Navy. Build two Armies adjacent to the space where you built the Navy.

name: Event_MaoTsetung
text: Eliminate an Axis Army in China or Szechuan.

name: Event_Tito'sPartisans
text: Eliminate an Axis Army in the Balkans; Then recruit a Soviet or United Kingdom Army in the Balkans.

name: Event_GeneralWinter
text: Eliminate 1 or 2 Axis Armies in or adjacent to Moscow.

name: Event_GermanSovietTreatyofFriendshipCooperationandDemarcation
clabel: German-Soviet Treaty of Friendship, Cooperation, and Demarcation [WIP]
text: Recruit an Army in Russia and an Army in Eastern Europe.

name: Event_TransSiberianRailroad
text: One at a time, once per Army, you may eliminate each SovietArmy on the board and then build that Army.

name: Response_DefenseoftheMotherland
clabel: Vasilevsky Takes Command in the Far East [WIP]
text: Use at the beginning of your turn. Recruit an Army in or adjacent to Moscow; then eliminate an Axis Army in Moscow.

name: Response_Stalingrad
text: Use when your Army in Ukraine is about to be removed. Do not remove that Army this turn.

name: Response_Leningrad
text: Use when your Army in Russia is about to be removed. Do not remove that Army this turn.

name: Response_Rasputitsa
text: Use immediately after an Axis Army is built in or adjacent to Moscow. Eliminate the Army just built.

name: Response_Moscow
text: Use when your Army in Moscow is about to be removed. Do not remove that Army this turn.

name: Status_Shvernik'sEvacuationCouncil
text: Soviet Armies are never out of supply. Armies must still be built adjacent to another supplied piece, or in your Home space.

name: Status_FrontalAssault
text: Use once per turn when you battle a land space. Discard 2 cards from your hand to battle in the same or adjacent land space to the one battled.

name: Status_WomenConscripts
text: Use when you play a Build Army card for your Play step. Place that Build Army card on the top of your draw deck instead of discarding it.

name: Status_StavkaFormsArtilleryCorps
text: Use once per turn when you battle a land space. Discard a card from hand to battle the same space.

name: Status_Guards
text: During your Play step, instead of playing a card from hand, discard 2 cards from your hand to play a Build Army card from your discard pile.

name: Status_ScorchedEarth
text: Ukraine is not a Supply space for the Axis.

name: Event_Plunder
text: Gain +1 Victory Point for each Italian Army or Navy outside Italy.

name: Event_ItalyAttacksCommunists
text: Build an Army in Ukraine and an Army in Russia.

name: EW_DecimaFlottigliaMASFrogmen
text: The United Kingdom must discard the top 1 card of its draw deck; and 1 more if there is no Allied Navy in the Mediterranean. Gain +1 Victory Point.

name: Event_GermanAidinGreece
text: Eliminate an Allied Army in the Balkans; then recruit a German Army in the Balkans.

name: Status_ImperoItaliano
text: During your Victory step, gain +1 Victory Point for each Axis Army in North Africa, Africa, or Middle East.

name: Status_AntiCommunistSentiment
text: During your Victory step, gain +1 Victory Point for each Italian Army in Russia or Ukraine.

name: Status_Bravado
text: During your Play step, instead of playing a card from hand, discard the top 2 cards of your draw deck to battle a land space.

name: Status_BalkanResources
text: During your Victory step, gain +1 Victory Point if an Italian Army is in the Balkans.

name: Event_DivisionAzul
text: Discard a random Soviet Response card from the table. You may not inspect the Response card discarded.

name: Response_GermanReinforcementsCounterattack
text: Use immediately after a supplied Italian Army is removed. Recruit a German Army in in that space.

name: Response_SkilledPilots
text: When you are the target of an EW card, reduce the number of cards you must discard by 5 (minimum 0)

name: Response_RomanianReinforcements
text: Use immediately after a supplied German Army is removed. Recruit an Italian Army in that space.

name: Event_AfrikaKorps
text: Recruit a German Army in North Africa and then a German Navy in the Mediterranean.

name: EW_RegiaMarinaClosesShippingLanes
text: For each Italian Navy on the board, gain +1 Victory Point and the United Kingdom must discard the top 1 card of its draw deck.

name: Response_MonteCassino
text: Use when an Axis Army in Italy is about to be removed. Do not remove that Army this turn.

name: Event_ItalianEastAfrica
text: Build an Army in North Africa and then a Navy in the Bay of Bengal.

name: Status_MareNostrum
text: During your Victory step, gain +1 Victory Point for each Italian Navy on the board.

name: Status_AmphibiousLandings
text: Use once per turn when you battle a land space. If the space battled is adjacent to a supplied United States Navy, discard the top 1 card of your draw deck to build an Army in the space battled.

name: Status_FlyingFortresses
text: Use when you play an EW card. Add 2 to the number of cards the Axis country must discard.

name: Event_OperationMagic
text: Discard a random Japanese Response card from the table. You may not inspect the Response card discarded.

name: Event_Guadalcanal
text: Recruit an Army in New Zealand; then. build a Navy adjacent to New Zealand.

name: EW_B29Superfortress
text: If a United States Army is within 3 spaces of Germany, Germany must discard the top 5 cards of its draw deck.

name: Event_LendLease
text: Your choice of the United Kingdom or the Soviet Union may play a card and then draw a card.

name: EW_B26Marauder
text: If a United States Army is within 3 spaces of an Axis Home space, that country must discard the top 4 cards of its draw deck.

name: Status_Radar
text: Use once per turn, when your supplied Navy is battled. Discard the top 2 cards of your draw deck and do not remove that Navy.

name: Status_RosietheRiveter
text: Use once per turn at the beginning of your Discard step. Take 1 or 2 cards from your hand and place them on the bottom of your draw deck.

name: Event_FlexibleResources
text: Play a card of your choice from your discard pile.

name: Status_AircraftCarriers
text: Use once per turn when you battle à sea space. Discard the top 1 card of your draw deck to build a Navy in the space battled.

name: Status_SuperiorShipyards
text: Use once per turn when you build a Navy. Discard the top 1 card of your draw deck to build an additional Navy.

name: Status_WartimeProduction
text: Use once per turn when you build an Army. Discard the top 1 card of your draw deck to build an additional Army.

name: Event_TheaterShift
text: One at a time, once per piece, you may eliminate each United States Army and Navy on the board and then build that piece.

name: EW_FirestormBombing
text: If a United States Army or Navy is adjacent to an Axis Home space, that country must discard the top 7 cards of in draw deck

name: Event_MurmanskConvoy
text: Recruit a Soviet Army in Russia; then the Soviet Union may build an Army.

name: Event_ArsenalofDemocracy
text: The United Kingdom may build an Army and a Navy in the order of its choice.

name: EW_SBDDauntless
text: If a United States Navy is within 2 spaces of Japan, Japan must discard the top 4 cards of its draw deck.

name: Event_FleetDeployedtoPearlHarbor
text: Recruit an Army in Hawaii; then build a Navy adjacent to Hawaii.

name: EW_B24Liberator
text: If a United States Army is within 2 spaces of Italy, Italy must discard the top 4 cards of its draw deck.

name: Event_PattonAdvances
text: Build an Army in Western Europe: then battle in Germany or Italy.
